prodNameC: 邦迪斯人類 PR3 酵素免疫分析套組
prodNameE: BINDAZYME Human Anti PR3 Enzyme Immunoassay Kit
ingredientsDesc:
● Instruction Leaflet
● QC Certificate
● PR3 Coated Wells: 12 breakapart 8 well strips coated with PR3 antigen 
● ANCA Sample Diluent: 2 bottles containing 50mL of buffer for sample dilution.
● Wash Buffer: 1 bottle containing 50mL of a 20-fold concentrated buffer for washing the wells. 
● PR3 Calibrators: 5 bottles each containing 1.2mL of diluted human serum, with the following concentrations of anti-PR3 autoantibody: 100, 33.3, 11.1, 3.7, 1.23 U/mL. 
● PR3 Positive Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2mL of diluted human serum. 
● PR3 Negative Control: 1 bottle containing 1.2mL of diluted human serum. 
● PR3 Conjugate: 1 bottle containing 12mL of purified peroxidase labelled antibody to human IgG.
● TMB Substrate: 1 bottle containing 14mL TMB substrate.
● Stop Solution: 1 bottle containing 14mL of 3M phosphoric acid.
applicantName: 太暘生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 新北市汐止區康寧街169巷25號13樓
efficacy: 本分析套組用於體外測量人類血清中蛋白水解酵素 (Protease 3, PR3) 自體抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.5660 多發性自體抗體免疫試驗系統

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: WARSTOCK ROAD, KINGS HEATH, BIRMINGHAM, B14 4RT, UNITED KINGDOM
